com.travelportal.controller

Class UserController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.travelportal.controller.UserController

  • @Controller
public class UserController
extends Object
    Controller class to manage methods and mappings used for the user functionalities

    naveen.kumar

      • cancelTicket

        @RequestMapping(value="/history/{ticketId}",
                method=GET)
public String cancelTicket(@PathVariable(value="ticketId")
                                 int ticketId,
                                 TicketModel ticketModel,
                                 org.springframework.ui.Model model)
        Method to cancel a flight from user history Send the control back to welcome page
        Parameters:
        model - Model
        ticketId - Integer
        ticketModel - TicketModel
        Returns:
        "redirect:/welcome" page

      • createHistoryPDF

        @RequestMapping(value="/createUserPDF",
                method=GET)
public String createHistoryPDF(UserModel userModel,
                                     javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request,
                                     javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response)
        Method to create the PDF of user history by calling method of TravelHistoryPDF
        Parameters:
        userModel - UserModel
        request - HttpServletRequest
        response - HttpServletResponse
        Returns:
        "history" page and pdf of user history in new tab
